title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 270-6.7 - Administrative fee
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 270-6.7 - Administrative fee

State Regulations

The commissioner may impose an administrative fee not to
exceed $500, based upon the costs of processing the conveyance or interest, such costs to be in addition to any other fee or appraised value. The fee may
be prorated and collected annually over the term of the conveyance or
interest. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
270-6.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
